name: Crunch (itch) (sightwise)
description:
„Crunch” is a submission for TriJam 143 themed „Sleepless nights“

You play as a indie dev who has only 7 days (and nights) left to finish their game. Playtest during the day and fix bugs during the night.

Will you find all the bugs? There is only so much time. And what will the critics say?

Played with arrow keys, c and x.
